member.name: IErrorInfo.GetDescription
member.summary: Returns a textual description of the error.
member.param: A brief description of the error.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IErrorInfo.GetGUID
member.summary: Returns the globally unique identifier (GUID) of the interface that defined the error.
member.param: A pointer to a GUID, or GUID_NULL, if the error was defined by the operating system.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IErrorInfo.GetHelpContext
member.summary: Returns the Help context identifier (ID) for the error.
member.param: The Help context ID for the error.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IErrorInfo.GetHelpFile
member.summary: Returns the path of the Help file that describes the error.
member.param: The fully qualified path of the Help file.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IErrorInfo.GetSource
member.summary: Returns the language-dependent programmatic ID (ProgID) for the class or application that raised the error.
member.param: A ProgID, in the form progname.objectname.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
